description: Application for non-material amendment (s96a) to planning permission ref:163829FUL dated 10/02/2017 for Construction of a first floor level rear extension and addition of a second floor level to the building; change of use of first floor level office space to residential to accommodate eight self-contained residential units (8x1 bed) including the alteration of the ground floor level shopfront to provide for a residential entrance to the upper levels of the building and associated cycle and refuse storage. Amendments for the replacement of materials and alteration of the wall separating the stairs from the internal courtyard, replacement of glass block/opening lights with opening windows in the internal courtyard and swapping over of the bathroom and internal store in apartments 03 and 07.
